to wake up/to be awake/to become aware/to sober up/to come to

sentences.english: The boy stumbled out of the room, blind with sleep.
sentences.chinese: 這個男孩在半夢半醒之間，跌跌撞撞走出了房間。

sentences.english: Scientists have decided that he is about half-and-half.
sentences.chinese: 科學家們已經確定，他們是半夢半醒。
